alert.note: Alert for Adams; Brown; Clinton; Fayette; Highland; Pike; Ross; Scioto (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 06 at 12:11PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF EAST CENTRAL BROWN, ADAMS, SOUTHERN FAYETTE, EASTERN CLINTON, WESTERN PIKE, HIGHLAND, NORTHWESTERN SCIOTO AND WESTERN ROSS COUNTIES THROUGH 1245 PM EDT... At 1211 PM EDT, strong thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Wilmington to near Belfast to Manchester, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph, pea size hail, and very heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Hail may cause minor damage to outdoor objects. Visibility will be poor and hydroplaning is possible. Locations impacted include... Washington Court House, Wilmington, Hillsboro, Greenfield, West Union, Sabina, Manchester, Peebles, Leesburg, New Vienna, Winchester, Marshall, Seaman, Bainbridge, Belfast, Highland Holiday, Kincaid Springs, Rocky Fork Point, Cynthiana and Russell. This includes I-71 in Ohio between mile markers 51 and 53. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a sturdy building. Motorists should slow down and use extra caution. To report hazardous weather conditions, go to our website at weather.gov/iln and submit your report via social media, when you can do so safely.

area.areaDesc: Adams; Brown; Clinton; Fayette; Highland; Pike; Ross; Scioto
